articles.title: Poll: It's been six months since the Xbox Series X|S launched, do you have one yet? - TrueAchievements
articles.description: The Xbox Series X and Xbox Series S launched just over six months ago. Do you have one yet? Let us know by voting in this week's TrueAchievements poll.
